title: Tender Prey
description: Finally freed from a demeaning eight year relationship, Ruben is ready to see what Denver's nightlife has to offer. When he sets his eyes on Jamal, does he really know what he's in for? Jamal isn't just a beautiful man willing to take him brutally, he's also a werewolf! And he doesn't have just love on his mind...This 5245 word story contains explicit oral and anal sex between two men.
author: Arielle Pierce
